improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The value of x becomes 0 after the loop, leading to a division by zero error in line 8.
The loop always executes 10 times, reducing x to 0 which leads to a division by zero error later.
Add a check to ensure x is not zero before performing the division. For example,  if x != 0 { y = (1 / x);}
